lines.line: *yawn*...oh, hello...*yawn* I'm sorry! I'm just so tired! I haven't slept in a week!
Why can't you sleep, what's wrong?
It's brother Androe's son! With his constant: Waaaaaah! Waaaaaaaaah! Androe said it's natural, but it's so annoying!
I suppose that's what kids do.
He was fine, up until last week! Thieves broke in! They stole his favourite sleeping blanket!
Now he won't rest until it's returned... ...and that means neither can I!
Please do. We won't be able to help you as we are peaceful men but we would be grateful for your help!
They hide in a secret cave in the forest. It's hidden under a ring of stones. Please, bring back the blanket!
I'm sorry to hear that! I hope you find his blanket.
Sorry! I'm too busy to hear your problems!
Please tell me you have the blanket.
Yes! I've recovered it from the clutches of the evil thieves!
Really, that's excellent, well done! Maybe now I will be able to get some rest.
*yawn*..I'm off to bed! Farewell brave traveller!
Much better now I'm sleeping well! Now I can organise the party.
The son of Brother Androe's birthday party. He's going to be one year old!
It's also a great excuse for a drink!
We just need Brother Cedric to return with the wine.
Cedric is a member of the order too. We sent him out three days ago to collect wine. But he didn't return!
He most probably got drunk and lost in the forest!
I don't suppose you could look for him?
I've no time for that, sorry.
Oh, he won't be far. Probably out in the forest.
Ok, I'll go and find him.
Can I come to the party?
Of course, but we need the wine first.
Enjoy it! I'll see you soon!
Hello adventurer, have you found Brother Cedric?
Well, keep looking, we need that wine!
Brother Omad needs the wine for the party.
Oh dear, oh dear, I knew I had to do something!
Pleashhh, find me a jug of water. Once I'm sober I'll 'elp you take the wine back.
Hic up! Oh my head! I need a jug of water.
I'll see if I can get some.
Yes I've seen him, he's a bit drunk!
Well, try your best to get him back here!
Cedric! Here, drink! I have some water.
Now I just need to fix this cart and we can go party.
No, I've helped enough monks today!
In that case I'd better drink more wine! It helps me think.
Excellent, I just need some wood. Some plain logs, or maybe a basic plank.
OK, I'll see what I can find.
He's having a bit of trouble with his cart.
Did you manage to get some wood?
Well done! Now I'll fix this cart. You head back to Brother Omad and tell him I'll be there soon.
Hi, I'm almost done here. Could you tell Omad that I'll be back soon?
Hi Omad, Brother Cedric is on his way!
Good! Good! Now we can party!
I have little to repay you with but please, take these runes.
Dum dee do la la! *hiccup* That was some party!

characters.name: Brother Omad
characters.description: Middle-aged male monk, warm British accent, exhausted and weary tone that becomes cheerful and enthusiastic after getting rest. A devout Saradomin worshipper who enjoys parties and values community.

characters.name: Brother Cedric
characters.description: Older male monk, slurred British accent, jovial and tipsy tone. A loveable drunk who has a fondness for wine but remains good-natured and helpful once sobered up.

characters.name: Monk
characters.description: Adult male, calm British accent, tired but pleasant tone. A generic Saradomin worshipper from the Ardougne Monastery who is looking forward to celebrating.
